Sns.Subject: SUCCESS: AWS CodeDeploy notification setup for trigger CodeDeployNotifications
Sns.Message:
Your AWS CodeDeploy trigger arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:123456789123:CodeDeployNotifications is able to send notifications for the SNS topic you specified.
All subscribers to the topic will receive notifications related to the events you specified for this trigger.
Thank you,
The AWS CodeDeploy Service Team
